trans-unit.source: Specifies the set of modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o conjunto de chaves de modificador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class is the set of the modifier keys that are currently pressed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> classe é o conjunto das teclas modificadoras que atualmente são pressionados.

trans-unit.source: Some [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] that make use of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration are the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> classes.
trans-unit.target: Alguns [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] que tornam o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeração são o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> classes.

trans-unit.source: One or more modifier keys, defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais teclas modificadoras, definidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeração, delimitada por um caractere "+".

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> that associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> que associa um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration to specify the modifier key of the gesture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> usa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeração para especificar a chave de modificador do gesto.
Pressione a tecla do logotipo do Windows.
